### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)) connected by pipes.

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill and a furnace at positions (60.0, -60.0) and (60.5, -61.5) respectively.

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Boiler at position(111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) connected to pipes.

### Offshore pump at position(107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) connected to pipes.

### Pipe groups
There are two pipe groups: one for water at position (107.5, -34.5) and one for steam at position (111.5, -33.5).

### Electricity group
Consists of a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5) with voltage 0.

### Belts
There are two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5) respectively.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when getting entities
- Make sure the entity exists at the specified position before trying to get it.
- Check the entity's prototype and position to ensure they match the expected values.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Check the connections to the boiler to ensure they are correct and not blocked.

### Errors when using generators
- Ensure the generator has a valid input liquid.
- Check the connections to the generator to ensure they are correct and not blocked.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were found in the provided logs.
